summary:
## 24 Hours of Le Mans: A Quick Summary

The 24 Hours of Le Mans is a famous car race in France. It's one of the oldest and most respected endurance races globally, running since 1923. Teams race for 24 hours, aiming to go the farthest distance. Cars can reach speeds over 250 mph, making it thrilling! The race is held on a mix of public roads and race tracks. It's now part of the FIA World Endurance Championship.
title: 24 Hours of Le Mans
